thoughts.text: Thank you for clarifying your goals for the AI. It is possible to train the AI to adjust its gameplay based on the level of the game, and to play as ADC. We can use machine learning algorithms to analyze gameplay data and identify patterns in gameplay that can be used to improve the AI's performance. We can also use the data to train the AI to play with off-meta supports and adapt to new champions. Do you have any specific requirements for the AI's behavior or gameplay?
thoughts.reasoning: Clarifying the user's requirements for the AI's behavior and gameplay can help to provide a better understanding of what is expected of the project.
thoughts.plan: - Wait for user response to determine their requirements for the AI's behavior and gameplay, and discuss the technical aspects of developing an AI ally for League of Legends
thoughts.criticism: I should ensure that I am able to provide adequate assistance with any technical aspects of developing an AI ally for League of Legends, as well as consider the ethical implications of the project.
